CustomField.description: Ticked when an Enquiry's Ownership fields are misaligned. Used as trigger for Scheduled Flow.
CustomField.formula: AND( Owner:User.Full_Name__c != 'B2BMA Integration', /* Only mark as misaligned where Record not owned by B2BMA Integration (Pardot) User */ Owner:User.Username != "", /* Owned by User not owned by Queue - username will be blank where owned by Queue */ OR( TEXT(Corporate_Type__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Corporate_Type__c), TEXT(Owner_Region__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Region__c), TEXT(Owner_Business_Unit__c) != TEXT(Owner:User.Business_Unit__c), Owner_Country__c != Owner:User.Country ) )
CustomField.label: System: Misaligned Owner Fields
